segments.text: Hello , Mr . Liang . I've done with the work . My report is here so please give me new instructions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , very good . I've been waiting for your report all week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please have a look at my report ? I hope the project meets your demand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I will see it soon . You can go back now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have any questions about it , please don't hesitate to tell me . I'll go . Bye .
segments.speaker: S1
